summary: Comprehensive testing of Smart Livestock Care (SLC) Farmer features completed. All backend APIs (33 tests) passed with 100% success rate. Frontend UI testing verified all farmer pages including login, My Animals, My Profile, Vaccinations, Deworming, Breeding, Ration Calculator, Area Measurement, and Interest Calculator.

backend: Farmer login with invalid password - returns 401 - PASSED
Farmer login with wrong role - returns 401 - PASSED
Get animals by species filter - PASSED
frontend: My Animals page with species filter tabs (All, Buffalo/Cattle, Sheep/Goat, Poultry, Others) - PASSED
My Profile page with farmer details - PASSED
Vaccinations page with existing records - PASSED
Add Vaccination dialog with species-specific vaccines - PASSED
Ration Calculator with Buffalo status and feeds selection - PASSED
Area Measurement calculator with results in multiple units - PASSED
Interest Calculator with Simple and Compound interest results - PASSED
Add Animal step-by-step flow (3 steps) - PASSED

seed_data_creation: Test animals created during backend testing with TEST- prefix tags
context_for_next_testing_agent: All farmer features are working correctly. Backend APIs tested with pytest (33 tests). Frontend UI tested with Playwright for login, navigation, and form interactions. Species-specific vaccines and breeds are properly implemented. Calculators (Area, Interest, Ration) are functional. No issues found.

features_verified.my_profile: Shows farmer details, Farmer ID, Total Animals count, Edit functionality
features_verified.my_animals: List view with species filter tabs, Add Animal button, animal cards with status badges
features_verified.add_animal: 3-step wizard: Species selection → Age/Gender/Status → Additional details
features_verified.vaccinations: List view with species tabs, Add Vaccination dialog with species-specific vaccines
features_verified.deworming: List view with Add Deworming functionality
features_verified.breeding: Shows Natural Mating and AI records with expected calving dates
features_verified.ration_calculator: Buffalo status selection, feed checkboxes with prices, calculates daily ration
features_verified.area_measurement: Length/Width inputs, Unit selection (Feet/Meters), Results in 6 units
features_verified.interest_calculator: Principal/Rate/Time inputs, Shows Simple and Compound interest with EMI
